summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4703 for the improvement of West Othello Street from 12th Avenue Southwest to 16th Avenue Southwest, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54485, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
